definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be good, well, glad, pleasing (Aram. [[יְטַב]] Zinj. [[יטב]] DHM:Sendsch. 57)—

definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: ) Impf. [[יִיטַב]] Ge 12:13 + 34 t., [[יִטַב]] 1Sa 24:5 + 3 t.; [[תִּיטַב]] Es 2:4 + 2 t.; [[תֵּיטְבִי]] (incorrect for [[תִּיטְבִי]] Ges:§ 70 R) Na 3:8; pl. [[יִיטְבוּ]] Ge 34:18; for Inf. and Pt. v. [[טוֹב]]—
be glad, joyful, [[לֵב]] Ju Jdg 18:20, Jdg 19:6, Jdg 19:9, 1Ki 21:7, Ru 3:7, Ec 7:3.
be well placed, [[הֲתֵיטְבִי מִנּאׁ אָמוֹן]] Na 3:8 art thou better placed than No of Amon?
make glad, rejoice [[לֵב]] Ju Jdg 19:22; [[פנים]] Pr 15:13; the person Ec 11:9.

do good to, deal well with, a person usu. c. prep.: c. [[לְ]], Ex 1:20, Jos 24:20 (both E), Ge 12:16, Nu 10:29, Nu 10:32 (all J), Ju Jdg 17:13, 1Sa 25:31, Ps 49:19, Ps 125:4; c. [[עִם]], Ge 32:10, Ge 32:13, Ge 32:13, Nu 10:32 (all J), Mic 2:7; c. acc. De 8:16, De 28:63, De 30:5, 1Sa 2:32, Je 18:10, Je 32:40, Je 32:41, Zec 8:15, Job 24:21, Ps 51:20; abs. Ez Eze 36:11; opp. [[הֵרַע]] (in prov. phr., cannot do good or ill, = cannot do anything at all; test of deity) Zep 1:12, Is 41:23, Je 10:5.

do well or thoroughly: [[אשׁר דבּרוּ]]([[כל]])[[הֵטִיבוּ ]] they have done well (all) that they have spoken De 5:25, De 18:17; [[על הרע כפים להיטיב]] Mic 7:3 their hands are upon the evil to do it well,i.e.diligently, thoroughly, lit. make (it) good, with play on [[הרע]]; esp. as auxil. sq. inf.; [[דעת]] ´[[היט]] Pr 15:2 = know well; [[לראות]] Je 1:12 see well; [[נַגֵּן]]([[לְ]]) play well, skilfully 1Sa 16:17, Is 23:16, Ez Eze 33:32; cf. pt. cstr. sq. subst. [[מֵטִבֵי חָָעַד]] Pr 30:29 marching well, in a stately manner, so [[מֵיטִבֵי לֶכֶת]] v:Pr 30:29; inf. abs. [[הֵיטֵיב]] as adv. = thoroughly, c. vbs.: [[כתת]] De 9:21, [[שׁאל]] De 13:15, [[דרשׁ]] De 17:4, De 19:18, [[באר]] De 27:8, [[שׁבּר]] 2Ki 11:18.

make a thing good, right, beautiful: c. acc. rei: the head 2Ki 9:30; dress, trim: a lamp Ex 30:7 (P); [[מַצֵּבוֹת]] Ho 10:1; [[גֵּהָה]] Pr 17:22 a glad heart maketh a good cure; sq. [[מִן]] compar., obj. [[שֵׁן]] 1Ki 1:47 ( = make it more glorious then); [[חֶסֶד]] Ru 3:10; sq. [[דֶּרֶךְ]] = course of life or action Je 2:33 (in order to win love); amend one's ways and doings Je 7:3, Je 18:11, Je 26:13, Je 35:15; ´[[הֵיטֵיב תֵּיטִיבוּ את־ד]] Je 7:5.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: of God, [[טוֹב מֵטִיב]] good and doing good Ps 119:68; so inf. abs. as adv. [[הַהֵיטֵב חָרָה לך]] Jon 4:4, Jon 4:9 art thou rightly angry ? sq. [[לי]] v:Jon 4:9. In [[כִּי־יֵיטִב אֶל־אָבִי]] 1Sa 20:13 vb. is appar. intrans., =

definitions.body: if it be pleasing unto my father, but

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: not elsewh. in this sense; point rather [[יִיטַב]]; on this and on foll. [[אֶת־]] v. We Dr.
